testcase.name: test_login_success

failure.message: AssertionError: assert 'token' in {'access_token': 'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjoiYWIxNzhlMGEtM2MzNy00N2RmLTgxZWYtMjUyMDJkMzA4Zjk3IiwiZW1haWwiOiJkZW1vQGZhY3R1cmF0aWUuc3IiLCJleHAiOjE3NzIyOTkxMTF9.f1OWw00nwZ5WJFVlf8DbNwBL93Rqe9_JZUAjJgKXHWM', 'token_type': 'bearer', 'user': {'address': None, 'company_name': 'Demo Bedrijf N.V.', 'created_at': '2026-02-27T11:39:35.286378+00:00', 'email': 'demo@facturatie.sr', ...}}

testcase.name: test_get_dashboard
testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_boekhouding_api.py:61: in test_get_dashboard assert response.status_code == 200, f"Dashboard failed: {response.text}" E AssertionError: Dashboard failed: {"detail":"Ongeldige token"} E assert 401 == 200 E + where 401 = <Response [401]>.status_code
